name: Black Trail VR
description:
It’s the gold rush era. Native people attacked the Snake Canyon mine just after a few days when white men discovered ancient artifacts. Jack, an experienced bounty hunter, and White Eagle, a respected warrior among his people, are after the same artifacts for different reasons.

Switch between characters throughout the chapters, use unique, historical weapons, fight hundreds of men in a wide Old West world, and change the fate of the war.

  • Dive into intense and varied combat encounters with a wide range of weapons. Each weapon introduces a unique mechanic and a new play style.

  • Survive, defend, infiltrate, or escape! Discover a new area and overcome a new challenge in each chapter.

  • Witness the clash of two worlds through the eyes of different characters and unravel the mysterious powers of ancient artifacts.

  • Unlock the Bounty Hunt after the main campaign and earn bounties when you kill in style and find timed bounty bags. Use the money to create unique weapon-enhancement combinations, and compete with other players to become a legend!
  • Experience a realistic and smooth VR interaction while using weapons and objects.
  • Choose from multiple movement and ease-of-use options designed for VR.
  • Follow the characters' epic stories through fully narrated and animated shorts.
  • Walk in delicately designed, Old West-inspired environments.
    And much more!

    Are you ready to embark on this epic adventure and prove your mettle in the wild, untamed West?
